name: Dubtrack Lime
description: This style makes Dubtrack Lime. Last update: 5 March 2017

user.name: DeathDodger
user.about: Hey there! I'm Dennis, and I'm 16 years old. I don't really like bright, or colorless sites, so sometimes I change them!

additional_info:
Screenshot made whilst DubX Split chat was enabled, on 03.20.2016

If I forgot something, please let me know! This style is updated when needed. Last check: 05.04.2017, everything working as it should! Small change in license, now it's CC-BY instead of CC-BY-SA.

--------------
-=Update Log=-
--------------

3.5.17 - Fixes & Other
- Added some stuff (forgot what tho :/)
- Fixed some stuff

9.4.16 - Chat options redo + Screen Fix
- Chat options now look better
- Logo added at upload profile pic
- The videoplayer and chat are centered again
- Mentions are now gray
- Player buttons are hoverable (if this is even a word xD) again

8.28.16 - Glow + Improvements
- Fixed the usernames
- Made the screen small again (due to sizing problems)
- Username hover now glows
- Higher than default usernames always glows
- Replaced the dubtrack logo with a dubtrack lime image
- Colored all social media links
- And more small things


UPDATE 7.21.2016 [Glow Update]
 - Now a lot of things glow! Like, dislike buttons, HD button, progress bars, and more!
 - Some of the progress bars have had a restyle, left is darker or lighter than the right side
 - Video players now also is seetrough!

UPDATE 7.17.2016 [Small Changes]
 - Changed the playtime bars (Now dark to light, instead of only light)
 - Playlists are now seethrough
 - Soundcloud logos are now orange
 - Changed the top of the preview player
 - Changed borders around create new playlist when adding a song to your playlist

UPDATE 6.28.2016 [Ranks Fix]
 - Ranks Color Changes
 - Rank Colors in chat working
 - Changed the room setup colors
 - Colored message when you add a song to the queue

UPDATE 6.11.2016 [Small Updates]
 - Colored dislike and heart button
 - Colored icons in playlists
 - Close playlist button hover
 - More small things

UPDATE 5.26.2016 [Small Changes]
 - Colored PMs fixed
 - Changed Donate Button
 - Changed Login Page
 - Since ads were removed again, I removed the ad remove script, since it was useless, and only making the video player off-centered.
